member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232
member.summary: A RS232 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RS232.Initialize(System.Int32,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.Serial.SerialParity,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.Serial.SerialStopBits,System.Int32,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.Serial.HardwareFlowControl)
member.summary: Initializes the serial port to the passed in parameters. If no parameters are passed, the defaults are used.
member.param: The baud rate for the serail port. Defaulted to 38400.
Specifies the parity bit for the serial port. Defaulted to none.
Specifies the number of stop bits used on the serial port. Defaulted to one.
The number of data bits. Defaulted to 8.
Specifies if the serial port should use flow control. Defaulted to not use.
